maml:description.maml:para: Gets Azure web hosting plan in the given resource group.
Gets Azure web hosting plan in the given resource group.
Name of the web hosting plan.
Name of the web hosting plan.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the web hosting plan myWHP in resource group "Default-Web-WestUS"

maml:description.maml:para: Gets Azure websites in the specified resource group
The Get-AzureWebsite cmdlet gets information about Azure websites in the specified resource group.
Name of the resource group associated with website.
Name of the resource group associated with website.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the website slot dev for ngolistandard from resource group Default-Web-WestUS

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new web hosting plan in a given Geo location.
Creates a new web hosting plan in a given Geo location with the specified SKU, worker size and number of workers.
Geo location where the webhosting plan to be created.
Sku of the Webhosting plan to be created.
Name of the web hosting plan.
Geo location where the webhosting plan to be created.
Sku of the Webhosting plan to be created.
Name of the web hosting plan.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates a new web hosting plan in resource group "Default-Web-WestUS" -with web hosting plan name "NgoliWHP" in geo location "West US" using Basic sku and allocates total 2 workers worker size is Small

maml:description.maml:para: Create an Azure website in a given a resource group using the specified web hosting plan and the data center.

Resource group to be associated with.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates a new Azure Website named MyFirstSite in the existing resourcegroup named Default-Web-WestUS in data center "West US" using existing web hosting plan MyWebHostingPlan

maml:description.maml:para: Remove an Azure Web hosting plan
Remove an Azure Web hosting plan

dev:remarks.maml:para: Deletes azure web hosting plan in resource group "Default-Web-WestUS" with web hosting plan name "NGoliStandard"

dev:remarks.maml:para: Deletes the Azure Website named MyFirstSite in the resourcegroup named Default-Web-WestUS

maml:description.maml:para: Stop and start an Azure Website.
Stops and then starts an Azure Website. If website is already in stopped state use Start-AzureWebsite command

Name of the resource group associated with website.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Stops the site MyFirstSite and then starts it.
